entry.title: Global Structure of Curves from Generalized Unitarity Cut of Three-loop Diagrams
entry.summary: Global structure of algebraic curves defined by generalized unitarity cut of four-dimensional three-loop diagrams with eleven propagators is studied in this paper. The global structure is topological invariant, and characterized by geometric genus of algebraic curve. We use Riemann-Hurwitz formula to compute the geometric genus of algebraic curves, with the help of convex hull polytope method and numeric algebraic geometry techniques. Some interesting properties of genus for arbitrary loop orders are also explored. Information of genus can serves as an initial step for integral or integrand reduction of three-loop amplitudes through algebraic geometry approach.
